parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.34

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Deletes an object. Only objects inserted in the mission editor and objects created during the game's progress can be deleted by this command. Island objects and player cannot be removed.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> The actual object deletion, when object becomes [[objNull]], happens on the next frame after command execution, but there are some object modifications that happen immediately. For example if the object is unit in a group, it immediately becomes groupless <tt>[[isNull]] [[group]] _unit; //true</tt></value></part></template><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Warning </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Do not use this command for deletion of dead [[crew]] members from a vehicle. Doing so may lead to all sorts of bugs and ghost objects left on the map. Instead use [[deleteVehicleCrew]], which was designed with this functionality in mind</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''deleteVehicle''' object

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[deleteVehicle]] _house1;</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Deleting a vehicle with crew: <code>// might want to make sure that the car is local
{car [[deleteVehicleCrew]] _x} [[forEach]] [[crew]] car;
[[deleteVehicle]] car;</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[createUnit]], [[createVehicleLocal]], [[createVehicle]], [[Arma_3:_Event_Handlers#Deleted | Deleted EH]]

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>



[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|DELETEVEHICLE]]
